code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import Card from"../components/Card";import Keyword from"../components/KeyWords";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function HomePage(){const BASE_URL="http://localhost:3000/api/jobs";const[jobs,setJobs]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[position,setPosition]=useState("computer science");const[location,setLocation]=useState("Israel");const fetchJobs=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"?keyword=").concat(position,"&location=").concat(location));if(!response.ok)throw new Error("Failed to fetch jobs");const data=await response.json();return data;}catch(error){console.error(error);return[];}};useEffect(()=>{const getJobs=async()=>{setLoading(true);const data=await fetchJobs();setJobs(data);setLoading(false);};getJobs();},[position,location]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center mt-5",children:"Loading jobs..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"mb-4",children:"Job List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Keyword,{position:position,setPosition:setPosition,location:location,setLocation:setLocation}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"jobCard d-flex flex-wrap gap-3",children:jobs.map((job,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{title:job.title,link:job.link,company:job.company,location:job.location},index))})]});}export default HomePage;
